website_summaries.verdict: A superior formula that produces beautifully lush results by a brand with a reputation for quality lash products.
pros: When used under mascara, it plumps, lengthens, and enhances even thin, sparse lashes
Also resists clumping, keeps mascara in place, and defines lashes
Many dedicated customers rave it's the best they've used
cons: One of the most expensive lash primers on the market
the upside is that it delivers impressive results for most users

customer_reviews.title: Keeps mascara on, even with watery eyes
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for years. I have fairly long eyelashes but they are thin, so I wanted a product that would thicken my lashes as well as lengthen, and this does both. My eyes also water quite easily, and this product helps keep my mascara on even through the tears. I use this with Pixi mascara from Target and have great results!
customer_reviews.author: E.Moser

customer_reviews.title: Used this for Years, it's a MUST HAVE!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this primer!!! I've used many others both less expensive and also a bit more and this one just rocks! It provides volume and defines my lashes. Goes on easily and does not clump my lashes, it provides lengthening, volume and defines lashes. Top it off with your favorite darker mascara and you'll have s dynamic duo and gorgeous lashes!
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: I splurged on this because I love Dior products
customer_reviews.text: I splurged on this because I love Dior products...although I have no complaints about the product, I don't think it's worth the difference in price compared to other volumizers I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy E. Hermanson

customer_reviews.title: Makes eyelashes look beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love Diorshow lash maximize! I have been using this product for a couple of years now since the product I was using was discontinued. The cost for this one is quite a bit higher than my old one but it is definitely worth it! I apply it in the morning before I put on my mascara and it definitely makes my eyelashes look longer and thicker and I have never had a problem with it irritating my eyes. I would highly recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Best one
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lash maximizer I've tried. Under mascara (my preferred brand is Buxom original)it really enhances, lengthens, thickens your lashes. A great product! A little pricier than most of the others, but also quite superior.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Augonnet

customer_reviews.title: Makes lashes nice and long!
customer_reviews.text: Love this primer. I apply one eye first, followed by my mascara then do the second eye. You do need to work fairly quickly as this drives quickly.
customer_reviews.author: RobinLou

customer_reviews.title: Product not usable
customer_reviews.text: This Dior maximizer was dried up and I could hardly get the brush out. The one I had been using the previous 8 weeks was more moist and pliable. This one will have to go in the trash...very disappointing at $29.50 a purchase. I would have preferred to contact the seller. Unfortunately that was not an option when I tried to return the item.
customer_reviews.author: Kari A Pate

customer_reviews.title: Really works well
customer_reviews.text: Really works. Give a look of longer ticker lashes, like I had before chemo.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Knight

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!! You can't go wrong with this
customer_reviews.text: I almost have to wear this before applying my mascara. It really does help to protect my lashes but not only that . It also helps almost any mascara that I use with it look amazing. It helps to make my lashes look thicker, longer & more beautiful !! Truly is a great product
customer_reviews.author: David & Chaia Kloster

customer_reviews.title: cost is way below Sephora's
customer_reviews.text: this is a quality mascara primer, the best I have found. I have thinning lashes and this really helps make them look thicker and lengthens as well. highly recommend. excellent price
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Clement

customer_reviews.title: Prevents lashes breaking and thinning
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years. The reason I started using a primer is that my lashes started thinning. This not only helped with plumping and looking better, but it also helped overtime to save my lashes. Never go without it. I have tried other primers and name brands, hands down the best I have ever tried.
customer_reviews.author: peace200001

customer_reviews.title: Waste of
customer_reviews.text: This just made my eyelashes heavier to where they couldn’t hold a curl. Didn’t notice any difference with any mascara. Waste of miney
customer_reviews.author: Sofakat123

customer_reviews.title: Didn't think primer was necessary until my gal pal let ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think primer was necessary until my gal pal let me try hers - wow! it makes a huge difference. Worth the price and extra step during the day
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for several years and there's nothing to compare. Does a great job thickening your lashes
customer_reviews.author: A. Keller

customer_reviews.text: I'm returning to Rodan.... this did not work for me
customer_reviews.author: Lituria

customer_reviews.title: This is the best product for your eyelashes
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product for your eyelashes. Been using it for years. You can really see the difference in your eyelashes when you use it.
customer_reviews.author: DELIANA WHITE

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I received this product and the brush was defective from the beginning because it was not properly attached to the wand. It came off inside the primer bottle and I am unable to use it anymore even though there is a ton of product left. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Castle

customer_reviews.title: Equal to L'Oreal. I have been using the Dior ...
customer_reviews.text: Equal to L'Oreal. I have been using the Dior primer for at least a month and it works just find, however I could find no discernable difference between the Dior and the L'Oreal. For the difference in price I will buy L'Oreal.
customer_reviews.author: Lyreh

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but works well as a primer to highlight your lashes before putting on mascara
customer_reviews.author: Jenniaerni

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Best mascara primer ever! A friend recommended the product to me, a sworn Clinique fan, and after one use I’m absolutely obsessed! (I still use my Clinique mascara over it, but omg what a difference!)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing primer, I have not had any mascara run off since.
customer_reviews.author: "Maggie for Margaret"

customer_reviews.title: Decent Product, Unsatisfactory Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Decent product, is not fresh and does not work as well as specified. When it came in it was out of the packaging completely and the packaging itself was damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great serum for the eye lashes. Highly recommended to use before applying mascara
customer_reviews.author: Paskii G

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: This is OK, just not nearly as good as Grande.
customer_reviews.author: Non

customer_reviews.title: Size is perfect for my intended use.
customer_reviews.text: Very average in coverage - no advantage over other products.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda R. Baham

customer_reviews.title: would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Does not make my short lashes any longer. Hard to get off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product over the previous year. It is incredible! It only takes a light coat prior to mascara. It lasts forever and extends the life of your mascara as you use less for the same effect!
customer_reviews.author: christina fillinger

customer_reviews.title: Real nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice.. Didn't expect anything less.. Could be a bit thicker
customer_reviews.author: Debra Hendriks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love that I read the reviews and purchased this product! Lashes better than ever.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, does not flake into eyes like others do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: waste of money, you have to scrape the bottle to get any on the brush. Seems like there is never enough on the brissles.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Definitely will reorder. Makes my lashes longer and voluminous
customer_reviews.author: mariya

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff makes a huge difference with my lashes! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: nancy marsh

customer_reviews.title: EMPTY CARTON - where’s my product?
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the envelope this came in. The box is empty! There isn’t any product!!! The maximizer must’ve fallen out and nobody noticed?!
customer_reviews.author: John Tait

customer_reviews.title: restock, have used this before. Not 100% sure ...
customer_reviews.text: restock, have used this before. Not 100% sure if it's authentic, but works the same as one I got from Sephora, so no complaints. I have no reference to say whether it is or isnt, but will say it' marked the same, smells the same, brush is the same, and it seems to perform the same.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, I wish my husband would put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this product by a Dior representative at Sephora I have been using this product almost everyday under my mascara and It makes a huge difference. I am older and my lashes need something to help with a more full look.
customer_reviews.author: J. De

customer_reviews.title: BRUSH BREAKS OFF INSIDE THE TUBE BEFORE EVEN ONE USE
customer_reviews.text: ON TOP OF THAT THE PRODUCT WAS ONLY 0.05 OUNCES INSTEAD OF 0.33 OUNCES ADVERTISED AND THEY TAKE 50% RE-STOCKING FEES AND SHIPPING OUT WHEN YOU RETURN IT- ALL AROUND POOR PRODUCT AND PURCHASING EXPERIENCE!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I usually use wet n wild/NYX mascara and it works beautifully under both. Even when I’m running low it can still add a little extra umph.
customer_reviews.author: Neko

customer_reviews.title: This Works!
customer_reviews.text: Better than lash extensions! I plan to never be without this indispensable product!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Better with mascara alone than with this
customer_reviews.text: Makes my lashes clumpy. Better with mascara alone than with this. Don't see that it helped my lashes at all.
customer_reviews.author: nora riley

customer_reviews.title: Best primer for eyelashes
customer_reviews.text: I first tried as a sample. Wow oh wow can't be without it and have purchased a few already so I don't run out....have fine light eyelashes but with this, long accentuated and natural looking.
customer_reviews.author: smith in the rockies

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really is a great product for maximizing lashes!! Best one on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: A true lash volumizer
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the eyelash plumpers I have tried, this one seems to adhere to lashes better and truly add volume.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cranford

customer_reviews.title: actually works
customer_reviews.text: it's great as a thickening primer because it actually thickens and easily allows any other mascara to glide on top of it. Without it my eyelashes look scant. It gives them thickness, length and volume. I will continue to use as long as it's around
customer_reviews.author: b.j.r

customer_reviews.title: Flutter, flutter
customer_reviews.text: If you can't manage false eyelashes, try this primer. It adds length and volume that looks very glamorous.
customer_reviews.author: Laurean Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I just can't be without this product. It makes my lashes really stand out once I add mascara.
customer_reviews.author: santa

customer_reviews.title: This is terrible.
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the brand name fool you. This is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Hammond

customer_reviews.title: A must have for mascara.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent primer. Use with Lorac mascara. Never smudges and last the entire day.
customer_reviews.author: SFKP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I put on before bed and before mascara, as directed
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try a different primer than my usual Tarte opening act. This one was just okay. I didn't notice a huge difference in my lashes with vs. without this primer. I'm going to use it because it was pricey. Maybe it will grow on me.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Hill

product_meta.title: Christian Dior Diorshow Maximizer 3D Triple Volume Plumping Lash Primer, 0.33 Ounce
product_meta.description: An ultra-black, high gloss mascara with a dual-sided brush. Lashes are enhanced with a liner effect, looking thick at the lash line, long and luscious through the tips.
